Articles.Content: Are we allowed to modify the logos in any way? Only reason I ask is because I\'m creating a fan site. Just wanted to ask..

> 
> Are we allowed to modify the logos in any way? Only reason I ask is because I\'m creating a fan site. Just wanted to ask..

I would say that\'s a no. Most companies don\'t like having their logos modified or used without their permission and I would expect Squad to be no different.

If you\'re just going to make a small version to place on the page, that\'s probably not a big deal, but altering it in anyway other than size is probably best to be avoided.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
